dublin_core.dcvalue: NetHope Academy provides technology training and resources to international development organizations The academy s goal is to help improve staff capacity and productivity by strengthening crucial information and communication technology skills Specifically the NetHope Academy Helps ICT Professionals explore career paths assess IT skills and develop learning plans to tailor their skills to the unique needs of NGOs as well as access a wide range of resources on ICT topics including training videos online tutorials and eCourses Offers resources to help Program Workers use computers and technology more effectively enhance their professional qualifications and find quality training designed to meet the unique needs of their NGOs Offers IT Internships with international NGOs to prepare students for full time careers in the IT field while allowing them to directly participate in building their communities Provides a forum for women in technology via Women s TechConnect a global community for sharing ideas and championing growth
